item.title: OpenVPN on OpenWrt
item.description: Install package You need to install the 3 packages openvpn-easy-rsa openvpn-mbedtls luci-app-openvpn: GUI of LuCI to manage OpenVPN Execute the command 1# opkg update 2# opkg install openvpn-easy-rsa openvpn-mbedtls luci-app-openvpn 3Installing openvpn-easy-rsa (3.0.8-3) to root... 4Downloading https://downloads.openwrt.org/releases/21.02.3/packages/mips_24kc/packages/openvpn-easy-rsa_3.0.8-3_all.ipk 5Installing libopenssl1.1 (1.1.1o-1) to root... 6Downloading https://downloads.openwrt.org/releases/21.02.3/packages/mips_24kc/base/libopenssl1.1_1.1.1o-1_mips_24kc.ipk 7Installing libopenssl-conf (1.1.1o-1) to root... 8Downloading https://downloads.openwrt.org/releases/21.02.3/packages/mips_24kc/base/libopenssl-conf_1.1.1o-1_mips_24kc.ipk 9Installing openssl-util (1.1.1o-1) to root... 10Downloading https://downloads.openwrt.org/releases/21.02.3/packages/mips_24kc/base/openssl-util_1.1.1o-1_mips_24kc.ipk 11Installing openvpn-mbedtls (2.5.3-3) to root... 12Downloading https://downloads.openwrt.org/releases/21.02.3/packages/mips_24kc/packages/openvpn-mbedtls_2.5.3-3_mips_24kc.ipk 13Installing kmod-tun (5.4.188-1) to root... 14Downloading https://downloads.

item.title: OpenWrt ADGuard Home
item.description: Reference AdGuard for OpenWrt: https://openwrt.org/docs/guide-user/services/dns/adguard-home AdGuard GitHub: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardHome IThome (Traditional Chinese): https://ithelp.ithome.com.tw/articles/10280241
